item.title: Bag of rubbish scattered around, 24th February
item.description:
Bag of rubbish scattered around. There arr a few of them behind the bushes. Kilos and kilos of rubbish. After my last report you collected one bag and left behind the rest of the rubish

item.title: Dumping of household waste., 24th February
item.description:
Someone has dumped a load of household waste including a large teddy bear outside Block 1, Rainbow Quay. I have canvassed neighbours, but noone has claimed responsibility. Unfortunately I did not see it when it happened.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rainbow Quay, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass, 24th February
item.description:
There is a pile of broken glass outside the nail spa. I have picked up the rubbish surrounding it but I cannot pick up the glass and dispose of it safely. It is dangerous to children and animals walking there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London

item.title: Lack of Cleaning services, 24th February
item.description:
On the block of Wrens Park House, it hasn't been clean for more than a month now. As can be seen on the pictures the comum area of each floor, stairs are really dirty.

item.title: Dumped here in august 2025, 24th February
item.description:
The above van was dumped here in August 2025 no tax no mot. Was reported in August and was told it would be removed. Has been reported now 3 or 4 times and still nothing been done about it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Alnwick Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog fouling and littering at the junction of Siward Road and Wendover Road, 24th February
item.description:
After you kindly cleared the dog litter a few weeks ago, there has been more littering and dog fouling in the same location. This has been a constant problem and nuisance for us. Please clear this and have some surveillance cameras installed to prevent this happening. This is the 5th request for surveillance cameras.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Siward Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The filter light to turn right is out, 24th February
item.description:
The right‑turn filter light for turning onto Queensbridge Road is not working. As a result, vehicles can only turn right once the main lights turn red and oncoming traffic has stopped. This is causing severe traffic congestion along Hackney Road and also increasing the risk of an accident happening.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 246-252, Hackney Road, Bethnal Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
